scraped_articles.content:
30 Beautiful Good Morning Quotes for Daily Motivation to Start A New Day

They are powerful reminders to embrace each morning with a hopeful mindset and a smile on your face. (Photo by Aaron Burden on Unsplash)

30 Beautiful Good Morning Quotes for Daily Motivation to Start A New Day

Waking up with a positive mindset can set a positive tone for your entire day.

To help you start each morning with a smile and a boost of motivation, we have compiled 30 beautiful good morning quotes.

These quotes are perfect for inspiring you to embrace the new day with energy and optimism.

These quotes are not just words.

They are powerful reminders to embrace each morning with a hopeful mindset and a smile on your face.

Take a look at these 30 beautiful good morning quotes below and let them inspire you as you embark on your journey each morning.

A. Best Beautiful Good Morning Quotes

1. "Make each day your masterpiece." — John Wooden

2. “The next morning dawned bright and sweet, like ribbon candy.“ — Sarah Addison Allen

3. "The morning was full of sunlight and hope." — Kate Chopin

4. “Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.” — William Blake

5. "Every morning is a beautiful morning." —Terri Guillemets

6. “She woke up every morning with the option of being anyone she wished. How beautiful it was that she always chose herself.” — Tyler Kent White

7. "Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening." — Mahatma Gandhi

8. “I remind myself every morning: Nothing I say this day will teach me anything. So, if I’m going to learn, I must do it by listening." — Larry King

9. “When I’m just waking up I like to keep a space for my own thoughts and ideas. Checking my phone is not a priority of mine.” — Andre D. Wagner

10. "Mornings are like nature in spring… humming with the sounds of life and the promise of a fresh new day!" — LeAura Alderson

B. Beautiful Good Morning Quotes to Give You Positive Spirit

1. "Do and act on what you believe to be right, and you'll wake up the next morning feeling good about yourself." —Janet Reno

2. "When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day." —F. Sionil Jose

3. “Waking up early, connecting with nature, and having my quiet time are priorities to me, and they are non-negotiable.” —Danette May

4. "One key to success is to have lunch at the time of day most people have breakfast." —Robert Brault

5. "No matter how bad things are, you can at least be happy that you woke up this morning." —D. L. Hughley

6. “Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.” —Buddha

7. “The day will be what you make it, so rise, like the sun, and burn.” —William C. Hannan

8. "Now that your eyes are open, make the sun jealous with your burning passion to start the day. Make the sun jealous or stay in bed." —Malak El Halabi

9. "Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have." —Lemony Snicket

10. “Get up in the morning and look at the world in a way that takes nothing for granted. Everything is phenomenal; everything is incredible; never treat life casually. To be spiritual is to be amazed.” —Abraham Joshua Heschel

C. Beautiful Good Morning Quotes to Boost Your Energy

1. "Every morning is a chance to ignite your energy and set your soul on fire. Seize it with passion!" - Unknown

2. "As the sun rises, so does your potential. Harness your energy, embrace the day, and make it extraordinary." - Unknown

3. "Good morning! Let your energy be contagious today, inspiring those around you to strive for greatness." - Unknown

4. "Today is your canvas. Paint it with vibrant colors, fueled by the boundless energy within you." - Unknown

5. "Wake up with a smile, fuel your day with optimism, and let your energy ignite the path to greatness." - Unknown

6. "Rise and shine! Today is another opportunity to unleash your inner power and conquer the world." - Unknown

7. "Good morning! Let your energy radiate positivity, enthusiasm, and unstoppable determination." - Unknown

8. "Rise above the challenges, greet the morning with vigor, and let your energy propel you towards success." - Unknown

9. "Good morning! Channel your inner strength, ignite your enthusiasm, and let your energy illuminate the world." - Unknown

10. "Embrace the dawn with open arms, let its energy awaken your spirit, and embark on a journey filled with possibilities." - Unknown

scraped_articles.title: Does Ovulation Make Women Moody? Here's the Explanation
scraped_articles.meta_description: During ovulation, a woman's mood can become very unstable. Feelings that were once fine can suddenly turn very bad.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: Ovulation, Fertile Period, Menstruation, Mood, Mood during Ovulation
scraped_articles.content:
Does Ovulation Make Women Moody? Here's the Explanation

Women often experience constant mood swings due to hormonal changes. Whether it's during Pre-Menstrual Syndrome (PMS), menstruation, or ovulation, moods can fluctuate.

Does Ovulation Make Women Moody? Here's the Explanation

There is an opinion stating that women's mood tends to be more fluctuating during ovulation (fertile period).

At this time, women's moods can become very unstable. Feelings that were once fine can quickly turn very bad. So, what is the connection between ovulation and mood changes? Here's the explanation.

Hormonal Changes During Ovulation

Hormonal changes during ovulation are one of the main causes of mood fluctuations in women. According to Healthline, a woman's mood changes throughout her menstrual cycle, including during ovulation.

During ovulation, estrogen and testosterone hormones increase significantly.

This change not only affects mood, but also increases or decreases sexual desire. In addition, physical changes can also occur, such as breasts feeling firmer, acne appearing, and skin becoming more sensitive.

The Influence of Hormones on Mood

Estrogen hormone is known to have a direct effect on neurotransmitters in the brain that regulate mood. High levels of estrogen during ovulation can make women feel more energetic and enthusiastic.

However, sudden changes in these hormone levels can also cause mood swings or drastic changes in mood.

On the other hand, a decrease in hormone levels after ovulation can make women feel more tired and moody. This can explain why emotions can change quickly during the fertile period.

During ovulation, women have a high chance of getting pregnant. Typically, this period only lasts for a few days in one menstrual cycle. For couples planning to have a child, ovulation is the right time to have regular sexual intercourse.

Ovulation Period and Chances of Pregnancy

However, this also needs to be supported by a healthy diet, regular exercise, and sufficient rest.

Ovulation usually occurs around the 14th day of a normal menstrual cycle, which is 28 days. During this time, the increase in estrogen and testosterone levels makes women feel more energetic and have a higher sexual desire. This makes sense as the body is preparing for the reproductive process.

Understanding that mood changes during ovulation are natural can help women better manage their emotions. Here are some tips for managing mood during ovulation:

Managing Mood During Ovulation

  1. Tracking Menstrual Cycle: Knowing when ovulation is about to occur can help prepare oneself mentally.
  2. Healthy Eating Patterns: Balanced nutrition can help maintain hormone stability.
  3. Sufficient Rest: Adequate sleep is crucial for emotional balance.
  4. Regular Exercise: Physical activity can release endorphins that can improve mood.
  5. Talking to Loved Ones: Discussing feelings with friends or partners can help reduce stress.

The influence of hormonal fluctuations on women's mood changes during ovulation is significant.

Although these changes can make emotions unstable, understanding and managing these changes can help women navigate their days more effectively.

scraped_articles.title: Is It Normal to Question Your Relationship? Understanding and Overcoming Doubts
scraped_articles.meta_description: This article will help you understand why people have doubts in relationships and how to deal with them in a healthy way.
scraped_articles.content:
Is It Normal to Question Your Relationship? Understanding and Overcoming Doubts

Relationships can be complicated. It’s normal to have questions and doubts sometimes. This article will help you understand why people have doubts in relationships and how to deal with them in a healthy way.

Are Relationship Doubts Normal?

Yes, it is normal to have some doubts in a relationship. Almost everyone questions their relationship at times. Doubts don’t always mean something is wrong. They can be a normal part of getting to know someone better and growing together.

Some common reasons people have doubts include:

• Feeling unsure if you’re truly compatible

• Worrying if your partner really loves you

• Being scared of commitment

• Having different goals for the future

• Noticing annoying habits or differences

Having occasional doubts doesn’t mean your relationship is doomed. What matters is how you handle those doubts. Talking openly with your partner and working through concerns together can make your relationship stronger.

Signs of Relationship OCD

Sometimes doubts can become excessive and turn into relationship OCD (ROCD). This is when someone has constant, intrusive thoughts and worries about their relationship. Signs of ROCD can include:

• Constantly questioning if you really love your partner

• Obsessing over small flaws or differences

• Needing frequent reassurance from your partner

• Comparing your relationship to others all the time

• Feeling unable to stop worrying thoughts about the relationship

ROCD is different from normal doubts. The thoughts are very intense and hard to control. They often lead to compulsive behaviors like constantly asking your partner if they love you. ROCD can seriously hurt relationships if not treated.

ROCD vs. Normal Relationship Doubts

It’s important to understand the difference between normal doubts and ROCD. Here are some key differences:

• Normal doubts come and go. ROCD thoughts are constant and overwhelming.

• Normal doubts are based on real issues. ROCD often focuses on imaginary problems.

• Normal doubts can be discussed calmly. ROCD causes extreme anxiety and distress.

• Normal doubts don’t interfere with daily life. ROCD disrupts work, social life, etc.

• Normal doubts can be resolved through communication. ROCD requires professional help.

If you think you might have ROCD, it’s best to talk to a therapist who specializes in OCD. They can help you learn to manage intrusive thoughts and compulsions.

Why Am I Having Doubts About My Relationship?

There are many reasons why people experience doubts in relationships. Some common causes include:

• Fear of getting hurt or rejected

• Bad experiences in past relationships

• Low self-esteem or insecurity

• Different values or life goals

• Communication problems

• Trust issues

• Feeling like something is missing

• Major life changes or stress

Sometimes doubts come from within ourselves, not from actual problems in the relationship. It’s important to reflect on where your doubts are coming from. Are they based on real issues? Or are they more about your own fears and insecurities?

Understanding the source of your doubts can help you address them in a healthy way. You may need to work on personal growth, improve communication with your partner, or seek help for past traumas.

How Doubts Can Affect Relationships

When doubts are not addressed, they can seriously hurt relationships. Some negative effects of ongoing doubts include:

• Less trust and intimacy between partners

• More arguments and conflict

• Feeling disconnected or distant from each other

• Decreased satisfaction in the relationship

• One partner pulling away or becoming less committed

• Increased anxiety and stress for both people

Doubts can become a self-fulfilling prophecy. If you constantly worry your partner will leave you, you might act in ways that push them away. Or if you’re always unsure about the relationship, you may not fully invest in it.

That’s why it’s so important to address doubts early on. Don’t let them fester and grow. Talk to your partner openly about your concerns. Work together to build more trust and connection.

How to Stop Doubting Your Relationship

If you’re struggling with doubts, there are steps you can take to overcome them:

• Identify the source of your doubts. Are they based on real problems or your own insecurities?

• Talk to your partner honestly about your feelings. Don’t keep doubts bottled up inside.

• Focus on the positives in your relationship. What do you love and appreciate about your partner?

• Work on building more trust through open communication and keeping your word.

• Address any underlying issues in the relationship, like different goals or values.

• Challenge negative thought patterns. Are you jumping to conclusions or assuming the worst?

• Practice self-care and work on your own personal growth and self-esteem.

• Consider talking to a therapist if doubts are excessive or tied to past traumas.

Remember that some uncertainty is normal in relationships. No one is 100% sure all the time. The goal is to work through doubts together and build a stronger connection.

The Importance of Communication

Good communication is key to overcoming doubts in relationships. When you keep worries and concerns to yourself, they often grow bigger. Talking openly with your partner can help in many ways:

• It allows you to express your needs and feelings

• You can work together to solve problems

• It builds more trust and intimacy

• You can clear up misunderstandings

• Your partner can reassure you about their feelings

• You feel more connected and on the same page

When talking about doubts, try to use “I” statements. For example, “I feel worried when…” instead of “You always…” This helps avoid blame and defensiveness. Listen to your partner’s perspective too. They may have insights or reassurance to offer.

Regular check-ins about the relationship can prevent doubts from building up. Make time to talk about how you’re both feeling and any concerns you have. Be honest but kind in your communication.

Self-Reflection and Personal Growth

Sometimes relationship doubts come from our own issues, not problems with our partner. That’s why self-reflection is so important. Ask yourself:

• What are my fears and insecurities in relationships?

• How have past experiences shaped my views on love?

• What are my core values and needs in a partnership?

• Am I truly ready for commitment?

• What can I do to build more self-esteem and confidence?

Working on personal growth can help reduce relationship doubts. This might involve:

• Going to therapy to work through past traumas

• Learning better communication skills

• Practicing self-care and self-compassion

• Setting personal goals and working towards them

• Building a strong support system outside your relationship

As you grow as a person, you’ll likely feel more secure in your relationships. You’ll be better able to recognize the difference between normal doubts and real problems.

When to Seek Professional Help

Sometimes it’s best to get help from a therapist or counselor for relationship doubts. Consider professional help if:

• Doubts are constant and overwhelming

• You can’t stop obsessive thoughts about the relationship

• Anxiety about the relationship is affecting your daily life

• You and your partner can’t communicate effectively about issues

• There are serious problems like infidelity or abuse

• You have a history of unhealthy relationships

• You’re considering ending the relationship but feel conflicted

A therapist can help you work through doubts in a healthy way. They can teach you better communication skills and help you understand the root of your concerns. Couples therapy can also be very helpful for addressing relationship issues together.

Remember, seeking help is a sign of strength, not weakness. It shows you care about your relationship and want to make it better.

Building Trust in Your Relationship

Trust is the foundation of a strong relationship. When trust is low, doubts often creep in. Here are some ways to build more trust with your partner:

• Be reliable. Do what you say you’ll do.

• Be honest, even about small things.

• Respect each other’s boundaries and privacy.

• Show empathy and support for your partner’s feelings.

• Admit mistakes and apologize sincerely.

• Share your thoughts and feelings openly.

• Spend quality time together to deepen your bond.

• Be faithful and committed to the relationship.

Building trust takes time and consistent effort from both partners. As trust grows, many doubts and insecurities naturally fade away. You’ll feel more secure in the relationship and your partner’s love for you.

Healthy vs. Unhealthy Doubts

Not all doubts are bad for relationships. Some doubts can actually be healthy and lead to growth. Here’s how to tell the difference:

Healthy doubts:

• Are based on real issues or incompatibilities

• Lead to productive conversations and problem-solving

• Motivate you to improve yourself or the relationship

• Help you clarify your needs and values

• Don’t consume all your thoughts

Unhealthy doubts:

• Are constant and overwhelming

• Are mostly based on fear or insecurity, not real problems

• Lead to arguments or emotional withdrawal

• Make you feel anxious and insecure most of the time

• Prevent you from fully committing to the relationship

Healthy doubts can help you address issues early and strengthen your bond. Unhealthy doubts often come from within and need to be worked through personally or with a therapist.

Dealing with Doubts in Long-Term Relationships

Even in long-term relationships, doubts can sometimes arise. This is normal, especially during big life changes or stressful times. Some common doubts in long-term relationships include:

• Wondering if you’ve grown apart

• Feeling bored or like the spark is gone

• Questioning if you’re still compatible

• Worrying you’re missing out on other experiences

• Feeling unsure about the future together

To address doubts in a long-term relationship:

• Communicate openly with your partner about your feelings

• Reflect on the history of your relationship and why you chose each other

• Make an effort to reconnect and create new experiences together

• Work on personal growth and encourage your partner to do the same

• Seek couples therapy if needed to work through issues

Remember that all relationships go through ups and downs. Doubts don’t have to mean the end. Often, working through challenges together can make your bond even stronger.

Doubts in New Relationships

It’s very common to have doubts in new relationships. You’re still getting to know each other and figuring out if you’re compatible. Some normal doubts in new relationships include:

• Wondering if you really like the person or just the idea of them

• Worrying if they feel the same way about you

• Being unsure if you’re ready for commitment

• Questioning if you have enough in common

• Feeling scared of getting hurt

To handle doubts in a new relationship:

• Take things slow and don’t rush into commitment

• Keep getting to know each other through deep conversations

• Pay attention to how you feel when you’re with them

• Be honest about your feelings and expectations

• Give it time – some doubts naturally fade as you grow closer

It’s okay to be cautious in a new relationship. Just make sure fear doesn’t hold you back from connecting. If the doubts persist or grow stronger over time, it may be a sign you’re not right for each other.

How Past Experiences Influence Doubts

Our past relationships and childhood experiences can greatly affect how we view current relationships. If you’ve been hurt before, it’s natural to have doubts and fears about getting close to someone new. Some ways past experiences can cause doubts:

• Fear of abandonment if a parent left when you were young

• Trust issues from being cheated on in the past

• Low self-esteem from emotional abuse in previous relationships

• Difficulty with intimacy if you didn’t see healthy relationships growing up

• Fear of commitment if you’ve been through a painful breakup

To overcome doubts from past experiences:

• Recognize how your past is influencing your current thoughts

• Work on healing from past hurts, possibly with a therapist

• Be open with your partner about your fears and insecurities

• Remind yourself that your current partner is not your ex

• Focus on the present and building new, positive experiences

It takes time to overcome the effects of past relationship trauma. Be patient with yourself and communicate openly with your partner about what you need to feel secure.

Self-Esteem and Relationship Doubts

Low self-esteem can lead to many doubts in relationships. When you don’t feel good about yourself, it’s hard to believe someone else truly loves and values you. Some ways low self-esteem causes doubts:

• Constantly worrying your partner will leave you for someone “better”

• Feeling like you don’t deserve love or happiness

• Misinterpreting your partner’s words or actions in a negative way

• Being overly sensitive to criticism or perceived rejection

• Pushing your partner away because you don’t feel worthy of love

To improve self-esteem and reduce doubts:

• Practice self-compassion and positive self-talk

• Set personal goals and celebrate your achievements

• Surround yourself with supportive people

• Challenge negative beliefs about yourself

• Focus on your positive qualities and what you bring to the relationship

As your self-esteem improves, you’ll likely feel more secure in your relationship. You’ll be better able to accept love and believe in your own worth as a partner.

Managing Expectations in Relationships

Unrealistic expectations can lead to many doubts and disappointments in relationships. It’s important to have a balanced view of what partnerships are really like. Some common unrealistic expectations:

• Thinking your partner should meet all your needs

• Expecting the excitement of early dating to last forever

• Believing you’ll never disagree or have conflicts

• Thinking love should always feel easy and effortless

• Expecting your partner to change fundamental parts of who they are

To manage expectations and reduce doubts:

• Accept that all relationships have ups and downs

• Recognize that your partner is human and will make mistakes

• Focus on growth and working through challenges together

• Appreciate the small, everyday moments of connection

• Communicate about expectations and find compromises

Having realistic expectations doesn’t mean settling for less. It means understanding that good relationships take work and no one is perfect. This mindset can help you appreciate what you have instead of always doubting or wanting more.

Recognizing Red Flags vs. Normal Doubts

It’s important to know the difference between normal relationship doubts and serious red flags. Red flags are warning signs of unhealthy or abusive behavior. Some examples of red flags include:

• Controlling or manipulative behavior

• Constant lying or secretiveness

• Disrespect for your boundaries

• Verbal or physical aggression

• Extreme jealousy or possessiveness

• Unwillingness to compromise or consider your needs

• Addiction issues that they refuse to address

If you notice these kinds of red flags, your doubts are justified. These are not normal relationship issues and often get worse over time. It’s important to take red flags seriously and consider if the relationship is safe and healthy for you.

Normal doubts, on the other hand, are usually about compatibility, commitment, or typical relationship challenges. They can often be worked through with good communication and effort from both partners.

Commitment Issues and Relationship Doubts

Fear of commitment can cause many doubts in relationships. Some signs of commitment issues include:

• Always looking for the “perfect” partner

• Feeling trapped or anxious as the relationship gets serious

• Constantly questioning if you’re with the right person

• Having a pattern of short-term relationships

• Avoiding discussions about the future

Commitment issues often come from fear of getting hurt or losing independence. To overcome commitment fears:

• Explore the root of your fears, possibly with a therapist

• Take things slow and communicate your needs

• Focus on the benefits of commitment, not just the risks

• Work on building trust gradually

• Remember that committing doesn’t mean losing yourself

It’s okay to take your time with commitment. But if you find yourself always running away from good relationships, it may be time to face your fears and work through them.

Using Doubts as Opportunities for Growth

While doubts can be uncomfortable, they can also lead to personal and relationship growth. Some ways to use doubts positively:

• See them as a chance to understand yourself better

• Use doubts to identify areas of the relationship that need work

• Let doubts motivate you to improve communication with your partner

• Use periods of uncertainty to reassess your values and goals

• See working through doubts as a way to strengthen your bond

When you face doubts together, you can come out stronger as a couple. You learn to trust each other more and develop better problem-solving skills. This can make your relationship more resilient in the long run.

Mindfulness and Overcoming Relationship Anxiety

Mindfulness practices can be very helpful for managing relationship doubts and anxiety. Some ways to use mindfulness:

• Practice staying present instead of worrying about the future

• Notice your thoughts without judging them

• Use breathing exercises to calm anxiety

• Focus on gratitude for positive aspects of your relationship

• Observe your emotions without getting caught up in them

Mindfulness can help you step back from anxious thoughts and see the bigger picture. It can also help you respond to relationship challenges more calmly and thoughtfully.

Finding Support When Dealing with Doubts

Dealing with relationship doubts can be tough. It’s important to have support. Some ways to find support:

• Talk to trusted friends or family members

• Join a support group for relationship issues

• See a therapist or relationship counselor

• Read books or articles about healthy relationships

• Connect with online communities for advice and understanding

Remember, you don’t have to face doubts alone. Getting outside perspectives can help you see things more clearly and find solutions.

Conclusion

Having doubts in a relationship is normal and doesn’t always mean something is wrong. What matters is how you handle those doubts. By communicating openly, working on personal growth, and building trust with your partner, you can overcome many relationship uncertainties. Remember that good relationships take effort and no one is perfect. Focus on growth, both individually and as a couple. With time and work, many doubts can turn into opportunities to create a stronger, more fulfilling partnership.

scraped_articles.title: 30 Zig Ziglar Quotes About Life and Business to Ignite Your Motivation
scraped_articles.meta_description: These quotes will ignite your motivation and set you on the path to success.
scraped_articles.content:
30 Zig Ziglar Quotes About Life and Business to Ignite Your Motivation

These quotes will ignite your motivation and set you on the path to success. (Photo on Facebook @Zig Ziglar)

30 Zig Ziglar Quotes About Life and Business to Ignite Your Motivation

Zig Ziglar is a legendary motivational speaker and author. He has inspired millions with his wisdom and positivity. 

This article provides some of the most powerful Zig Ziglar quotes to help you stay focused, overcome obstacles, and achieve your goals. 

These Zig Ziglar quotes are perfect for someone who is looking for a boost in their personal life or seeking inspiration for their career.

These quotes will ignite your motivation and set you on the path to success.

© 2024 trstdly.com

Join us as we journey through these 30 Zig Ziglar quotes below and discover the timeless inspiration that can transform your mindset on life and business. Let’s explore together!

A. Zig Ziglar Quotes About Life

1. “Remember that failure is an event, not a person.

2. “With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.”

3. “When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there.”

4. “The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.”

5. “Goals enable you to do more for yourself and others, too.”

6. "Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs."

7. “Success must never be measured by how much money you have.”

8. “Courage is on display every day, and only the courageous wring the most out of life.”

9. “If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.”

10. “Do more than you are being paid to do, and you’ll eventually be paid more for what you do.”

11. “The greatest of all mistakes is to do nothing because you think you can only do a little.”

12. “Money is not the most important thing, but when you need it, there are few substitutes. So while I like the things money can buy, I love what money won’t buy. It bought me a house but it won’t buy me a home. It would buy me a companion but it won’t buy me a friend.”

13. “True success has more components than one sentence or idea can contain.”
building people.”

14. “You can make positive deposits in your own economy every day by reading and listening to powerful, positive, life-changing content and by associating with encouraging and hope-

15. “Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life–all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.”

B. Zig Ziglar Quotes About Business

1. “What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.”

2. “If you want to reach a goal, you must ‘see the reaching’ in your own mind before you actually arrive at your goal.”

3.  “The top salesperson in the organization probably missed more sales than 90% of the salespeople on the team, but they also made more calls than the others made.”

4. “Profitability comes from loyalty, productivity, and having a character base from which to work.”

5. “The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity”

6. “You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.”

7. “You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.”

8. “I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don’t hold the title of a salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.”

9. “Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.”

10. "Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.”

11. “For every sale you miss because you’re too enthusiastic, you will miss a hundred because you’re not enthusiastic enough.”

12. “Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.”

13. “People often say motivation doesn’t last. Neither does bathing — that’s why we recommend it daily.”

14. “Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.”

15. “Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.”

scraped_articles.title: Did You Know That NCT's Jaehyun Changed His Name Several Times? Here are the Reason!
scraped_articles.meta_description: The  reason why he changed his name was because of his grandmother.
scraped_articles.content:
Did You Know That NCT's Jaehyun Changed His Name Several Times? Here are the Reason!

The reason why he changed his name was because of his grandmother.

Did You Know That NCT's Jaehyun Changed His Name Several Times? Here are the Reason!

Jaehyun from NCT has been part of NCT U and NCT 127 since 2016. He's known for his good looks and talents. He's the main visual, vocalist, dancer, and rapper in the NCT boy group.

But, did you know that NCT's Jaehyun changed his name several times?

According to Koreaboo, Jaehyun NCT has changed his birth name.

© trstdly 2023

1. Jung Jaehyun is His Birth Name

Previously, NCT ​​Jaehyun's mother liked the name Sunwoo, as reported by Koreaboo. Meanwhile, his father wanted to name him Lin.

Because of these differences, his parents finally agreed to name him Jung Jaehyun.

This name is also the stage name Jaehyun uses in NCT currently.

2. Jaehyun Changed His Name During Middle School

Jaehyun has changed his name when he entered middle school.

The reason why he changed his name was because of his grandmother. It is known "Jaehyun" does not have a hanja name.

Koreans often use Hanja characters to write names or calendars. Unfortunately, there is no hanja character for 'Hyun.'

That is why Jaehyun's birth name was legally or formally changed to Jung Yoon Oh, who has a hanja character.

3. His Official Name is Jung Yoon Oh

Jaehyun has the official legal name Jung Yoon Oh.

In Hanja characters, Yoon means 'Leap Year' or 'Extra,' and Oh means 'Five' or 'Military.'

But Jaehyun still uses his birth name as a stage name, which is popular until now.

4. Jaehyun Has Several Nicknames and Call Names

Casper: This nickname was given to Jaehyun because he has pale white skin, like the character Casper.

Valentine Boy: Jaehyun was born on February 14, 1997, on Valentine's Day.

Woojae: The nickname Woojae was given by Doyoung NCT. Woojae is from the words Woori and Jaehyun. It can be meant as our Jaehyun or Jaehyun.

Jung Jaehyuk: This nickname is given because Jaehyun is skilled and good at cooking.

Jay: This name was given by his teacher when he was living in the United States. It makes it easier to call Jaehyun.

Chris Tucker is a great American actor and a brilliant comedian. He's best known for his character, Detective James Carter, in the famous comedy action series "Rush Hour." He always makes the audience laugh with his natural comedy.

Top 5 Greatest Chris Tucker Movies You Must Watch

From his iconic role as Detective James Carter in the "Rush Hour" series to his unforgettable performance in the cult classic "Friday," Tucker has solidified himself as a Hollywood favorite. His unique blend of humor and charisma has captivated audiences for decades, making him one of the most iconic figures in modern Hollywood.

In this article, we will share the top 5 greatest and most iconic Chris Tucker movies you must watch!

"Friday" is the film that catapulted Chris Tucker into stardom. In this movie, Tucker plays Smokey, a small drug peddler. He and his unemployed friend Craig Jones (played by Ice Cube) have to find a way to pay a $200 debt to a drug dealer, or they won't see Saturday.

1. Friday (1995)

Chris Tucker delivers a standout performance with his fast-talking and animated personality. He also has a great chemistry with co-star Ice Cube, which creates a dynamic and memorable duo on screen.

There's no denying that "Rush Hour" is Tucker's most famous and iconic movie. Chris Tucker plays the role of Detective James Carter from LAPD. He must work with Detective Lee from Hong Kong police to find the kidnapped daughter of a Chinese diplomat.

2. Rush Hour (1998)

Tucker's quick wit and funny one-liners keep the audience entertained throughout the film. His chemistry with Jackie Chan's character also adds to the overall enjoyment of the movie. The banter and dynamic between the two lead characters make "Rush Hour" a fun and engaging watch.

In the second installment of the "Rush Hour" series, Tucker once again captivates the audience with his hilarious jokes. He filled the movie with his signature humor and fast-talking style.

3. Rush Hour 2 (2001)

In this movie, his chemistry with Jackie Chan seems to grow deeper. The result is that we get funnier and more natural banter between the two superstars, which keeps us laughing all the time.

"The Fift Element" is a French science fiction comedy action film directed by Luc Besson. The film is set in a futuristic world where a taxi driver named Korben Dallas gets involved in a mission to save the Earth from an ancient evil force. Chris Tucker plays the character of Ruby Rhod, a flamboyant and energetic radio host who gets caught up in the adventure with Dallas.

4. The Fifth Element (1997)

Tucker's performance as Ruby Rhod adds humor and energy to the movie, and his character's interactions with the other characters provide some of the film's most entertaining moments.

In Quentin Tarantino's crime film "Jackie Brown," Chris Tucker delivers a memorable performance alongside stars like Pam Grier and Samuel L. Jackson. Despite a smaller role, Tucker leaves an impact with his unique presence. His contribution adds to the overall appeal of the movie, creating lasting moments for audiences.

5. Jackie Brown (1997)

scraped_articles.title: The 5 Most Haunted Military Bases in the US
scraped_articles.meta_description: Here are the 5 most haunted military bases in the US that will give you goosebump.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: most haunted military bases in the US,haunted military bases
scraped_articles.content:
The 5 Most Haunted Military Bases in the US

The 5 Most Haunted Military Bases in the US

Military bases are often the site of strange and unexplained events.

Many of these bases have a long history, and some have even been the scene of violent conflicts. This combination of history and tragedy can create an atmosphere that is ripe for ghostly encounters.

Here are some of the most haunted military bases in the United States:

1. West Point Military Academy, New York

West Point is one of the most haunted places in New York state. The academy has a long history, dating back to the Revolutionary War.

It is said that the ghost of a cavalry soldier can still be seen patrolling the grounds.

One of the most haunted locations on the base is Room 4714, where a ghostly figure is said to appear.

© 2024 trstdly.com

2. Fort Leavenworth, Kansas

Fort Leavenworth is one of the oldest continuously active military bases in the United States.

It has a reputation for being one of the most haunted military installations, with numerous reports of paranormal activity. One of the most famous haunted locations is the Rookery, the oldest building on the base. The Rookery is said to be haunted by the spirit of a woman in a long dress.

3. Plattsburgh Air Force Base, New York

Plattsburgh Air Force Base, now a civilian airport, has a long history of strange events.

People report seeing ghostly figures in old-style clothes in the base cemetery and the Old Stone Barracks. A local ghost tour guide tells of shadowy figures in old clothes walking on porches and disappearing through closed doors. Many soldiers and civilians have shared stories of unexplained sightings, making the old base a spooky place.

4. Fort Monroe, Virginia

Fort Monroe is one of the oldest military installations in the United States, with a history dating back to the early 17th century.

The fort has been the site of numerous paranormal encounters. One of the most famous legends is that of Edgar Allan Poe, who served briefly at Fort Monroe and is said to haunt the casemates where he wrote some of his early works.

5. Fort Concho, Texas

Fort Concho was an active military post from 1867 to 1889. It is now a museum, but it is still said to be haunted.

Visitors have reported seeing ghostly figures in period clothing, and hearing the sound of marching soldiers. One of the most famous ghost in Fort Concho is the ghost of Ranald MacKenzie. He was a young US Army commander during the civil war. Some say his ghost haunt the Officers’ Quarter 3, the building where he was lived.

scraped_articles.title: Bob Marley's Wise Answer About the Perfect Woman
scraped_articles.meta_description: Bob Marley was once asked the criteria for the perfect woman for him.
scraped_articles.content:
Bob Marley's Wise Answer About the Perfect Woman

Bob Marley's Wise Answer About the Perfect Woman

Bob Marley was once asked the criteria for the perfect woman for him. He firmly replied that he was not interested in perfection.

"Who cares about perfection," he asked.

Even Marley said the moon could be better; its surface is full of craters.

"And the sea? The water is salty and dark in the depths," he said.

trstly.com

The reggae musician emphasized that beauty is not about perfection but about specialness.

"Even the sky is imperfect because it has no end," he said.

Marley said every woman, just like men, chooses who is special.

"So stop wanting to be perfect!" he concluded.

The man, whose real name is Robert Nesta Marley, was born on February 6, 1945, in St. Anne, Nine Mile, Jamaica.

trstdly.com

He is best known for his strong belief in the Rastafari movement, which can be reflected in the songs he sang.

Incredibly, his songs sold more than 20 million copies during his career.

trstdly.com

50 Birthday Wishes for Grandma That Will Make Your Nana Smile

50 Birthday Wishes for Grandma That Will Make Your Nana Smile

Celebrating a grandmother's birthday is a special occasion filled with love and cherished memories. Finding the perfect birthday wishes for Grandma can make her day even more memorable. Whether she's near or far, expressing your heartfelt sentiments can bridge any distance and bring joy to her heart.

Grandmothers hold a unique place in our lives. Their wisdom, kindness, and endless love deserve to be celebrated in the best way possible. Choosing the right words to convey your feelings can sometimes be challenging, but the effort is always worth it. A thoughtful message can light up her day and show her how much she means to you.

If you are looking for great birthday wishes for Grandma, you come to the right place.

In this article, we have already selected some of the best ones for you from various sources, Tuesday (2/7/2024). From sweet to funny, these wishes will help you express your love and appreciation on her special day.

A. Short Birthday Wishes for Grandma

1. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Your love lights up my life.

2. Wishing you a day as wonderful as you are. Happy Birthday!

3. Happy Birthday to the best grandma in the world!

4. May your birthday be filled with joy and laughter. Love you!

6. To my amazing grandma, Happy Birthday! Enjoy your day!

10. Wishing you a birthday as special as you are. Love you, Grandma!

12. To my dearest grandma, may your birthday be as lovely as you are.

13. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Your smile brightens my world.

14. Wishing you endless happiness on your special day. Happy Birthday!

15. Happy Birthday to the sweetest grandma! Enjoy your day!

16. Happy Birthday, Grandma! You mean the world to me.

17. Happy Birthday, Grandma! You are a treasure in my life.

18. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Your love is a gift I cherish every day.

19. To the best grandma ever, Happy Birthday! Have a fantastic day!

20. Happy Birthday! Your love and wisdom make life beautiful.

B. Sweet Birthday Wishes for Grandma

1. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Your love and wisdom have shaped my life in so many wonderful ways. Thank you for everything.

2. Wishing the happiest of birthdays to the most amazing grandma. Your warmth and kindness are unmatched.

3. Happy Birthday to my dear grandma. Your love is a guiding light in my life. May your day be filled with joy and laughter.

4. May your special day be filled with all the things you love the most, from family and friends to cake and laughter.

5. On your special day, I want you to know how much you mean to me. Happy Birthday, Grandma! You are my hero.

6. Happy Birthday to the sweetest grandma. Your love has been a constant source of comfort and joy. Enjoy your special day!

7. Grandma, your love has always been my safe haven. Happy Birthday! May your day be as beautiful as you are.

8. Wishing a wonderful birthday to my incredible grandma. Your wisdom and kindness have touched my heart deeply.

9. A grandmother is the second mother in a child's life. For me, you were my mother, sister, and friend! I am very happy to be your grandchild!

10. Happy Birthday to the best grandma in the world. Your love and care have made my life so much brighter.

11. To my grandmother, happy birthday! You're certainly the most amazing woman I know. I wish to be just like you someday. On your birthday, my only wish is for you to have a healthier and longer life. I love you so much!

12. You were there for me no matter what, whenever I needed you. You were always there to give me a warm hug when I needed one. Grandma, happy birthday! You have my undying affection!

14. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Your heart is pure gold, and your love has made my life richer.

15. Grandma, you are the epitome of love and kindness. Happy Birthday! May your day be filled with joy and laughter.

C. Funny Birthday Wishes for Grandma

1. To the lady who spoiled me with cookies and stories, have a birthday as sweet as your love, Grandma!

2. Grandma, you're not old; you're vintage, like a rare and treasured family heirloom. Happy birthday!

3. Happy Birthday to the grandma who always knows where to find the best snacks and the funniest stories!

4. Happy Birthday, Grandma! I promise not to tell anyone how old you are... mostly because I can't count that high!

6. Happy birthday to my favorite grandma and the only one I'd ever want! Plus I checked, and there are no returns.

10. I still can't figure out why I should call you granny rather than auntie. Guess age is just a number but not the looks. Have a fantastic day.

11. To my hilarious grandma, Happy Birthday! You make getting older look fun.

12. Happy Birthday to the grandma who's young at heart and slightly older everywhere else!

13. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Don't worry about the candles – we'll call the fire department just in case!

14. Wishing you a birthday as fun and awesome as you are, Grandma! Let's party like it's 1959!

15. Happy Birthday, Grandma! Remember, age is just a number – a really, really big one!

Top 6 The Rock Movies You Need To Watch

Top 6 The Rock Movies You Need To Watch

Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson is a well-known actor and former professional wrestler who has made a name for himself in Hollywood. After a successful career in the wrestling ring, Johnson transitioned into acting and has become one of the most recognizable faces in the industry.

Known for his charismatic personality and impressive physique, Johnson has starred in a number of blockbuster films that have captivated audiences around the world. Here are some of the best The Rock movies you must watch.

1. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)

In the 2017 movie "Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle," four high school students get sucked into a video game. They must navigate through dangerous jungles and overcome various obstacles to escape.

Dwayne Johnson plays Dr. Smolder Bravestone, a fearless and charismatic adventurer in the game world. His performance adds humor and excitement to the movie, making it a fun and thrilling experience for audiences. It is available for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.

2. Fast Five (2011)

In the action-packed movie "Fast Five," The Rock plays Hobbs, a tough federal agent tasked with capturing Dominic Toretto and his crew.

Fast Five

He's so good at portraying the ruthless agent with a high sense of responsibility. His performance is so intense that it keeps viewers in their seats. You can watch this on Amazon Prime Video, Vudu, or Apple TV.

3. Jumanji: The Next Level (2019)

The four teenagers are back, but this time, they find out that the game has changed. Dwayne Johnson once again delivers a strong and entertaining performance as Dr. Bravestone.

In this movie, we can see him as a charismatic guy with a good sense of humor. His chemistry with other stars in the movie keeps audiences entertained throughout the movie. This movie is available on Amazon Prime Video, Vudu, and Apple TV.

"Moana" is the 2016 animated film by Disney. The movie follows the thrilling adventure of Moana, a spirited young girl. She is on a mission to persuade the demigod Maui to return Goddess Te Fiti's heart to save her people.

4. Moana (2016)

Moana

The Rock voiced the Demigod Maui. Ron Clements, "Moana" co-director, praised his charismatic performance and his great comedic timing, which makes him so likable. You can watch it on Disney Hotstar, on Amazon Prime Video, Vudu, and Apple TV.

"The Rundown" is an American action comedy film directed by Peter Berg. Dwyane Johnson takes the central role as Beck, a ruthless bounty hunter who has a dream to own a restaurant. To make his dream come true, he takes a job to bring back the son of a powerful mob boss from the Amazon. However, in the middle of his mission, he becomes involved in a fight against a local tyrant.

5. The Rundown (2003)

You can watch this movie on Amazon Prime Video, Vudu, and Apple TV.

6. Fast & Furious 6 (2013)

Dwayne Johnson is back as Hobbs in "Fast & Furious 6." This time, he teamed up with Dominic Toretto and his crew to track and catch a highly skilled mercenary organization.

Fast & Furious 6

Johnson delivers one of his strongest performances in the series. His charisma and fighting skills really match Hobbs's intense and ruthless behavior, keeping the audience on the edge of their seat. It is available on Amazon Prime Video, Vudu, and Apple TV.
